SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ach! I'm in the sea! I'm gonna drown!
Are ye all right, Constantine!?
...Constantine?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar har har! Ye all right there, lass?
Hoist anchor, lads! We got a wee minnow
what needs savin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, but they be catchin' up while we
was savin' the minnow... Think, Ivar!
Think! It's time to be comin' up with
a whale of an idea!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Awake at last, minnow? Gar, what were ye
doin' out there in the briny blue? Did ye run
aground in a storm? And who be ye, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Thank ye, sir. My body's not a
swimming model, so that could've
been quite the problem. I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I’m here looking for my heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yer name's Viva Jive and ye be lookin'
for a heart? Gar, but we reeled in a
strange one today, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I be Ivar, captain of the Sea Turtle.
Finest ship on the blue, so she be!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Baltasar's firing at us, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Keep yer damn breeches on, lad!
He can't be reachin' us from there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
So Baltasar be gettin' himself a new
cannon, eh? Well, the ocean can take
his bones, says me! All hands, ready for close-quarter combat!
Hoist the mainsail! All arms at the ready, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Is that a pirate ship?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, it be that fair and true!
Baltasar the pirate is comin'
after the goods we carry!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! I gotcha, Ivar!
Now hand over the egg and maybe
I'll let yer pathetic crew live.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I don't trust ye far as I can throw ye!
If I be handin' me crew over to ye,
they'll dance at the end of a rope
before the day be out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Aw, c'mon! I raised ya, remember?
Even a pirate king has a soft spot
for his own boy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Soft spot... Ye mean your heart?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, ye always were a bilge-suckin' rat!
Fine then. Take the damn egg—and may
ye never have a day's luck with it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ya chose well, boy. Stand down, men!
I promised to spare their lives,
so that's what I'm gonna do... AFTER we set their ship on fire!
Bwaaaaaa ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Why, ye blasted sea snake!
How am I supposed to be makin'
a livin' without me ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Figure it out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
We're in the sea again!
I'm gonna drown!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Don't be givin' up, minnow! Grab on
and I'll swim ye to that island!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Me precious Sea Turtle's burnin'!
She be in so much pain... *sniff* Damn that Baltasar! Next time I see him,
I'll pull out his guts and use 'em for garters!
I'll gouge out his eye and cram it right up
his own... Oh. Yer okay, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Aye, my body's creaky in places, but it's not
a problem. Still, that geezer looked a fiend,
and I've not heard of a fiend raising a human.
Also, the egg. Not a normal one, that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Do ye really not know Deus Maris's egg,
minnow? Gar, but ye really are from
across the briny blue...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Well then, here be a tale, fair and true!
These waters have a god of the sea that
hatches from a mighty egg. Takes years, so it do—sometimes decades—
but when Deus Maris finally be hatched,
he ascends to heaven in a mighty cyclone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But before he goes, Deus Maris be grantin'
a wish to whoever hatched the egg. Gives ye
anything, so he does. Riches, fame, strength—
ye have but to name it, and it be yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Suppose I did get some high energy
readings from that egg, didn't I?
So were ye gonna wish on it, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, 'twasn't mine. I only be hired to transport it,
but somehow Baltasar caught wind and wise. I hear
he'll ask Deus Maris to turn him back to a man,
though I think he's better suited as a fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
The egg be what turned him fiend
in the first place. Yar, me father and Baltasar used to be true
mates on the sea, but when the most recent
egg hatched, me father died, and Baltasar
turned into the monster ye be seein' earlier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
With me father a dead man, Baltasar raised me
as his own. I was but a wee minnow when it
happened, so I don't be rememberin' me real
father, nor Baltasar's true face.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But here's what I can't wrap me head around:
what kinda wish coulda killed one of 'em and
turned the other into a fiend? Yar, maybe it's
best to leave such wishes be...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I cannae tell ye based on that, but there's loads
of magic and tricks across the worlds, so I imagine
some godly being would be able to make people's
wishes come true real easy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gahar har har! Ye be a funny one, Viva Jive!
And yet, yer words give me a sense'a peace
I've not felt in a whale's year. Aye, a man's gotta think long and hard
if he be makin' a wish of Deus Maris,
as such a thing's like to blow back
on ye more than not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Could be I'll find me a heart if I
make a wish to this Deus Maris, then.
But what're ye gonna do now, Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
First, we be getting off this island!
Plenty'a wreckage washes up here, so it do,
and we'll use it to build a raft and sail to
freedom! That is, assumin' ye wanna help?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye, love! That'd be brilliant!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Then from this moment on,
minnow, ye be a proud member
of Cap'n Ivar's crew! But seein' as yer the lowest-rankin' sailor
here, ye gotta be doin' everything I say.
Now get to work collectin' that lumber.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Is everything in working order?
Get any seawater in you?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Constantine! You're safe! Oh, what a relief.
I'm fine, 'cause my mech core was built to
resist pressure and corrosive substances
and all the like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I certainly do hope so—for if you were to break
down, then that would mean the failure of the
National Extradimensional Exploratory Task
Force's mission. Be careful, now!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Oi! Quit chattin' like a couple'a gulls
on the mast and get to buildin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Fine work puttin' that together, minnow,
but I still got questions for ye. Yer name's odd as old fish guts,
and the things ye say make no sense.
So tell me true! Who are ye, and for
what purpose did ye come to this sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I'm looking for a heart.
Do ye know where I might find one?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, I be no good at philosophical stuff.
All I be knowin' is if someone's blatherin'
about hearts in these waters, they be havin'
a few screws loose!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Ach. I see.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, no need for the doom and gloom, minnow!
If ye like, I'll help search for yer prize.
'Tis always smooth sailin' with Captain Ivar,
even on a raft! Gahar har har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But it also be the newbie's job to row,
so get to rowin', minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I thought raft-buildin' might be
too much for those scrawny arms, minnow. Ho, lads! Get this raft assembled before
I be assemblin' my boot up yer behinds!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye, Captain! Right away!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
By the way, minnow... Yer name's odd as old
fish guts, and the things ye say make no sense.
So tell me true! Who are ye, and for what purpose
did ye come to this sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I come bearin' ill news, boss: that scabrous
knave Baltasar stormed the Sea Turtle,
seized the goods, and set her to burn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
Blast it all! That fiend knows I built
the Sea Turtle with my own two hands,
and he went ahead and burned her anyway! I might feel more forgiving if he were at
least the type to make timely payments
for the work I do for him, but he doesn't
have that going for him either.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I take it you'll need a new boat, Ivar?
Hard to make a living without one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Yar, but I be havin' no coin.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Why are all my customers broke? Well, turns out we've got bigger problems than your empty purse: my architect went chasing after some skirt again, and now he's gone missing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
By grog, does that blasted simpleton fall
in love with every lass he sees!? Fine then. I'll be findin' yer architect;
I'll clap him in irons and drag him home
in a sack if I have to. But once I do, cully,
ye'll build me a new ship for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I never work for free, Captain, but how about we say I'll give it to you at a very steep discount. No deposit required.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I'll be holdin' ye to that, cully!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: That ship seems a wee bit off.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Fiends be all over 'em! We gotta get in
there and help before their ship ends
up at the bottom of the briny blue!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: The two of us are fine, but that fiend attack has simply ruined our honeymoon! Isn't that right, babygirl?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Yeaaah, but the fiends are, like,
totally gone now, so maybe we can
just enjoy ourselves or whatever?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Gar, but it be the architect!
Back to the shipyard with ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
I think not, sir! I am currently on
a honeymoon with my babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Get yer scurvy tush in gear before
I use yer teeth for confetti!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Good heavens, this raft is the most
rickety thing I've ever...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Hmmm... But wait... Yes... Yes!
Just feel the balance! The flow!
The sophisticated triangular design! O, glorious envy! Your fires rage within me!
The desire to build ships burns in my breast!
Quickly, man! Now! To the shipyard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: Quite fond of boats, isn't he?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Aye, he be a strange one,
but good at his job.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Ah, so currents are the reason all
this wreckage washed ashore here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, but that's not all—there be seaborne
killers here that attack ships and devour
both passengers and crew.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
And by chum, do they ever look tasty!
Can't say how long I've been wantin'
to bite into one of 'em! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Aye, but I'm the only one who eats 'em.
Whatever be floatin' yer boat, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Heavens, it's Captain Ivar!
Oh, now this IS a relief!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Washed up ashore alone, I see.
Shame the comely lass abandoned ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Uh... No! No, it's not like that at ALL, sir!
You see, our ship was attacked by marauders,
but just before it sank, my babygirl grabbed
me and threw me overboard, saving my life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Oh, my darling! My precious! My love!
I live only because of you, babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
I'm just glad you're safe, love.
Climb aboard the raft now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
There's a flock of fiends in the sky.
What're they up to?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gar, there probably be somethin'
tasty swimmin' beneath 'em.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text: Is that us, do ye think?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gahaaar har har! That be me stomach,
minnow! She rumbles like an old cannon
whenever I see a tasty-lookin' fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
I think ye might have a wee fiend
living in your belly, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
There you are! I'm not even going to ask
where you were or why—just get in there
and design Ivar a ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Right then! I've already got the basic framework
in mind, so I'll just add a few personal touches
based on Captain Ivar's preferences and...
Yes, take this... Move this here...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Aye, that's sharp made! I just saw
a ship come to life in front of me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And now for the finishing touch!
Captain Ivar? If you would be so kind?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Best let her do it, Captain; your luck
hasn't exactly been stellar lately.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Yar, go on, minnow. Add the final stroke.
They say it be good luck, so they do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text: Well, good luck out there, Ivar. And for the love of Deus Maris, try to keep this one afloat.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Surrenderin' already, minnow?
Fine, just give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
We be ready to sail now, by gar!
But before we hoist anchor, I need grub!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
It's yer lucky day, minnow—I'm gonna
fix ye me world-famous Pirate Surprise!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Best be honest with ye:
I cannae eat in this body.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And here it be! One Pirate Surprise!
Go on now, minnow! Eat hearty!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Sorry, love, but my mech body
cannae have any food.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
On a diet, minnow? Well, yer missin' out
on this delicacy! This be a common fiend
ye can catch easy in these seas! Low in fat,
and also healthy as anything, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text: Looks a bit plain to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Gar, most hear 'fiend meat' and their eyes
damn near pop outta their skulls, but it be
the finest flavor in all the seas! 'Tis the
only thing that can satisfy me hunger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Aye, but that was the finest of meals...
Now hoist anchor, lads! We make for the
Southern Trade Port to take on cargo and
tell 'em the sad tale of the stolen egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Ivar! You're alive! When I heard the
Sea Turtle sank, I figured you went
down with the ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I managed to get out,
but Baltasar stole the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
I KNEW using the egg to make a quick buck
was a stupid idea! That's just not the
kind of cargo a decent person deals with.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gar, don't be givin' up now! Ye gave me
the down payment for the egg, and I'll
get it back, fair and true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
In that case, I hear Baltasar can
be found at the blue hole. It's apparently VERY bright at the moment,
and his ship is just sailing in circles
around it for...some reason.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
If it be glowing, it means that feculent
maggot Baltasar is up to no good... Yar, then that's where we're headin'!
But first, I'll be needin' some cargo—
can't chase down a rat without
a bit'a gold linin' me pockets.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Just don't push yourself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Have ye a plan for getting
the egg then, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gahar har har! We'll be figurin' that
out once we get there, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, that there be an endless pit where
Deus Maris is said to descend from the
heavens—and while I can't say what Baltasar
be schemin', I know the egg is involved.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Ye'll understand if ye ever hold the egg,
minnow, but a man just can't help talkin'
sweet to the thing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
I cannae claim to understand
the logic behind that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, but the egg be talkin' back—
right into yer noggin! Now that I'm thinkin' on it, the same thing
happened when I dragged ye outta the brine.
The egg told me to drop anchor, and I found
ye sputterin' in the waves not long after.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
I suppose I'll have to see for myself.
Do ye think Baltasar also follows
its orders, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, perhaps—for the egg takes
no man's wishes for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, what be the meanin' of this,
ye rotten cockroach!? Where be the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
I should ask the same, ya blasted
fart-smeller! The egg went and
threw itself into the damn ocean!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Gahaaar har har har har!
Sounds like it hates ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Shut up, ya blasted boy! I'm gonna sink yer...
Oh, hell. I give up. I'll never be findin'
the egg in a sea this deep. So long.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
So long? SO LONG!? That's all ye got
to say after sinkin' a man's ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
The Blue Demon be out and about
in these parts, Ivar. Watch yerself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
What's that boat there, Captain?
It doesn't look so dangerous.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, that ship belong to Azure, sworn guardian
of Deus Maris. She be ruthless against any
pirate who seek the egg, and they all be
rightly terrified of her! Oh, but don't go worryin' about it,
minnow, 'cause we're not pirates. Gahar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
But enough'a that tale! I swore I'd never
give up tryin' to find the egg, and now
it be at the bottom of the deep!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
But we cannae dive to get it, no.
Maybe it'll come up on its own?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Or we can talk to it ourselves!
No harm in tryin', by gar. Go on now, lads! Get to wishin'!
Wish for the egg to come outta hidin'
with everythin' ye got!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, it's quite the special egg,
but why'd it decide to listen
to your plea there, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Yar, it be likin' me more than Baltasar...
Now raise those sails high, lads!
We make for the southern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Er, but won't that guardian start
targeting us if we do that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Dinnae ye say Deus Maris goes home
by climbing a cyclone to heaven?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, which means me wish will be comin'
true if we get to the cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text:
Ach, this wind!
The ship cannae hold!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text: Gar, we can't even get close!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text:
Enemies, ho! There's fiends
flyin' out of the cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Those gar-blasted fiends took the egg!
After them, me hearties!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
We gotta retreat, Captain! Any closer
and our wee ship'll go down!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text: Gar, I lost the egg again...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Aye, 'tis a shame—but your ship and
life are more important than an egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Gahar har har! Yer startin' to sound like
a true lass of the sea, minnow! Aye, but ye only be half-right: while we be
needin' a boat, what we really be needin'
is a BIGGER boat! Now let's sail to port
and get us some coin!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Glad to see you in one piece, Ivar. But I've got
bad news: the cyclone you tried to throw yourself
into wasn't the Pillar to Heaven—we would've been
able to see the Pillar from all the way out here. It's an understandable mistake, though,
considering you've never seen it before.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Gar, this be all me fault...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Look, anyone holding the egg would do the
same thing the moment they saw a cyclone.
And honestly, I think it's great that you care
enough about your wish to stake your life on it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Those blasted old men really put you through the wringer—treated you like a dirty thief whenever you wanted something, which turned you into a kid who didn't want anything.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, belay that talk, harbormaster!
I be full-grown now, and I want me
cut of the goods same as any!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Aw! It's so sweet to see my
cute little Ivar all grown up!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: How old even are ye, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Stow it, minnow! ...Now then, harbormaster,
have ye any work for us? We've not much time,
and I'm needin' to make a fine haul so I can
buy meself a larger ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Hmmm... Well, I've got a couple of ideas.
You can either get the scientist out at the
lighthouse to draw up a lease agreement, or you
can reclaim stolen goods from a pirate base. Both options are dangerous in their own ways,
so I'll leave the choice to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I be not excited about the pirate base.
We can't even be gettin' there with our sloop,
so we'll need to go back to the shipyard
and switch over to a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: We'll choose one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Oh, I almost forgot. You saved a passenger
ship a while ago, right? Well, they wanted
me to pass something along in thanks.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Much appreciated. Cheers!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text: Tra la la la la! Oh! Hello there, friend! I am Carolina, a wandering minstrel. Now take a seat—quietly—and listen to my rapturous song.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, it be Carolina! We're in luck,
minnow—'tis rare to cross her path.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
High atop the tower,
void of all its light.
The color that brings happiness
is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds,
what evil should appear?
The very worst of all the beasts...
The one all pirates fear! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Tra la la la lay!
Agents of chaos on water are they!
Their hiding place, hey!
Their hiding place, ho!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
AAAND...KEY CHANGE!
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
And a shaba-dabba-do
that I sing just for you! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I can't claim to understand that one
very well, but I'll pray for your success.
And now, I must be off. WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
Yar, damn me eyes! That song's gonna be
stuck in me head for the rest of the day! What else did she say, though?
I can't even be rememberin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
I'd wager a guess the 'agents of chaos' she
was on about were pirates, which means we
just need to find their hidey-hole.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Hello? Please, help me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Another victim!? Yar, we be comin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much, my friends!
I may be a marine researcher, but I was
very close to being fish food!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Those violent pirates sunk my ship
and cast me adrift—I've been out
here for three days and nights!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, 'tis a pity. But tell me, man,
did ye see a pirate named Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Sadly, my hearty friend, I research
large sea creatures, not pirate monikers. But there's a more important issue: my research
notes have been washed away! Those notes are of
vital import to the scientific community at large,
so I implore you to look for them with all haste!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Have ye seen how vast the ocean be?
'Tis a fool's errand to even look.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Large sea creatures?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
The creature known as 'Deus Maris'
in these parts is believed by people 
of science and learning to be some
manner of large sea creature.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Let's get data on Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Nae, this poor man is confused.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
If yer researchin' Deus Maris, cully,
ye might be good for somethin' after all.
We'll help ye find yer missin' notes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much! Now then, I have two missing 
notebooks. They both have a water-resistant coating and
boast magnificent buoyancy, so you should be able to
find them floating on the water's surface.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: We'll find 'em easy, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, don't be gettin' yer hopes up, minnow!
The sea be vast, and we've plenty of other
business to attend to besides.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, ye egghead! We'll be droppin' ye off
at the next port; ye should be able to
book passage on another ship there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, of course—and thank you again.
You saved my life this day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
My notes! Oh, but this is just wonderful!
They're undamaged, and the data is intact.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, but 'tis passin' strange—
yer log be lookin' different from mine.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Aye, your technology isn't from
this world. Have ye come from
an outer ocean like me, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, yes! Precisely so.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
TWO outsiders? Yar, is all the sketchy
folk showin' up lately a sign that
Deus Maris's ascension be near?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Those are my research notes! And those fiends are...sniffing them? Fascinating...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
They're throwing them in the air and...
Oh, what a brilliant catch! Fine notes
ye have there, sir, to be withstanding
the fiends' power as they are!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
I say, they're treating it like a toy!
Oh, but this is simply brillia— Wait, no!
This is TERRIBLE! Those fiends are going
to destroy my life's work!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Not to worry, love. I'll fetch 'em.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
They're back! My beloved research notes!
I am now one step closer to unlocking
the mysteries of the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Well, that's just fine. Now if ye don't
mind, could you maybe tell me a bit
about Deus Maris?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, while you did indeed help me and
I very much appreciate it, this data is far too
advanced for the layperson to even begin—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Spill it before I pull out yer tongue
and toss ye over the side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
EEEEEEP! Er, I mean, o-of course, sir!
You may consider class in session! The creature you call the Deus Maris shares traits
with so-called 'divine' beings from other worlds,
including transcendental power, the ability to
grant blessings, and a most majestic presence.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
In contrast to genuinely divine beings,
however, Deus Maris has a life cycle—
hence Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, just stop talkin', egghead.
I ain't followin' a thing ye say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, I rather feared that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Nae, this is valuable data.
Do keep going, if ye please.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, fine—but I be losin'
me patience fast!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Right. Now then, if Deus Maris's egg were to remain in this world, it would be a mere egg like any other. However, this creature has a life cycle that actually straddles the Conjoined Worlds using the egg form! It's remarkable!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
I understand Deus Maris reincarnates
through an egg, but why? Surely there
are more suitable forms for it to take?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Deus Maris's egg is a vessel which contains
the will of every life-form in this world—
or perhaps the more poetic 'sentiment'
is a better word than 'will.' All manner of sentiments find their way
across the sea and into that egg, at which
point it exchanges them for power in the
Conjoined Worlds to which it is connected.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Some posit that a portion of the exchanged power
can be used to grant wishes, but this is mere
conjecture at the moment. Also, we have no idea
where Deus Maris goes once it ascends to heaven. Indeed, I've only just begun my journey
into researching this most magnificent
of marine creatures!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, my thanks again for the help.
I will now be returning to my...ocean.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, me head be achin' fit to split.
Did ye follow any of that, minnow?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
I've no heart myself, so I cannae claim to
understand this 'sentiment' he was on about.
Oh, maybe there's no point in me searching
for the egg since I'm but a machine...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
So the egg didn't come outta the sea because
it was respondin' to me sentiments? Maybe ye
haven't seen it for yerself then, for there
be only one sentiment I have for true!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Ho, minnow! See where that black ship be
anchored? See the crack in the cliff beyond?
That be the base of the White Whale Pirates.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
And the blue ship belongs to Azure,
aye? Do ye think she's also got
business at their base, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnow,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
So why not go see Azure?
She might lend us a hand.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnow.
We'll see how big ya are on that plan
after ya get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Only tars that be knowing the route can sail
these caves on a ship, minnow; we're like
to sink if we try it. What should we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Aye, no ship—but a raft
could do it proper.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Yar, that be a fine idea, minnow!
We'll return to the shipyard
and switch to our raft!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
We be feelin' a raft ride today!
Have ye one we can plunder?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Sure. The one the two of you made
a while back is surprisingly sturdy,
so I've kept it tied to the pier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
One raft, square and true! Now we can get
through the reef without runnin' aground or
going through the sea caves—'cause there
be fiends in the caves, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Not sure I should be choosin' how we
approach this fight, minnow, so I'll
be leavin' that to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And the blue ship belongs to Azure,
aye? Do ye think she's also got
business at their base, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnow,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Why not go see Azure first, then?
She might even lend us a hand.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnow.
We'll see how big ya are on that plan
after ya get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I met Azure at the harbor when I was but a
wee sprat. She was starin' a hole through me,
and I found it terrifyin'. Yar, it still shivers me timbers just to
think about it! Never did work up the guts
to talk to the lass.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I cannae claim to understand the human
feeling of 'terror,' so I suppose we should
just go talk to her.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, but those eyes... If I see 'em...
Nay, we daren't.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Don't look at 'em, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: No one here? That cannae be right.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, it's just as the rumors say:
Azure pilots the Blue Demon alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: I am NOT alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: The souls of guardians move my ship. Many, many guardians.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Got no reason to believe ye, love;
ships need muscles to steer 'em.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
This is all you pirates' fault! You tortured
the guardians to learn more about Deus Maris,
then you killed them for fun! But I am now the final guardian, and I'm
going to make VERY sure that every pirate
pays for those crimes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: That true, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Yar, I be no pirate! But I know
someone who was: me father.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You were born and raised by pirates, Ivar!
Deus Maris doesn't want you making
a wish on the egg—the fact you lost it
in the cyclone is proof of that. Listen to me. Unless you want to die,
just go home and forget about this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: What were ye doin' here, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I came to confirm whether or not Baltasar had
the egg—and planned to kill him if he did.
But since he's yet to obtain it, my work
in this place is pretty much wrapped up.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And now I've a question for YOU, stranger:
Why do you pursue Deus Maris's egg?
Do you intend to make a wish?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Aye, for my heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Nae, I've no wishes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Oh, I'll make a wish to Deus Maris,
but I don't know if I'll actually find
my heart that way.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Wishes come at a price, stranger.
Best stand ready to pay the cost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The guardian spirits stir...
You must leave this place at once!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Oh, and off she pops.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Aye, but the guard on Baltasar's should be
down now, so the sneakin' will be easier.
So then, minnow, about what ye—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
My wish, do ye mean?
Did I say something wrong?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
No, no. Ye be a good, honest lass.
Still, which of our wishes is gonna
be stronger, do ye think?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Do not lie to me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You have come to our waters from an outer ocean
for a reason, stranger—and Deus Maris knows
what it is! You can hide nothing from him!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You mean my wish? I was told to be
honest, so I answered such. I'm sorry.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
With the Blue Demon gone, the pirates be
lowerin' their guard and returnin' to land.
That's fair luck for us, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, these be Baltasar's quarters.
Mangy cur's probably off drinkin'
himself under some table or another.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
By Deus Maris, there be a jade urn
on his desk! Can we really take it,
or is this a trap?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
We've not been trapped or anything
like it, so I think we should do it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Yar, now let's be splittin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Guard incoming!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, what be the password!?
I say hey—HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: And then ho—HO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Greetings, love!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, by the hells! I didn't know you lot
were back already! Now take my shift!
I wanna go off and drink with all the
cute lasses while I still can!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Oh! Sorry, love, I—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Yar, who be ye!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: URK!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Ye just need to make up whatever comes
to mind, minnow. Now keep yer guard up,
'cause we're goin' back to the raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Aye, I'm sorry.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, Ivar! Ya really gonna come all this
way and not say hello to yer old man?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yer only me father when it be convenient!
Ye treated me like dirt me whole life,
and I be wantin' nothin' to do with ye!
...Oh, and I'll be takin' this jade urn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Heh.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: We're surrounded, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
You can take that with ye, Ivar,
but I'll be keepin' the lass here.
Seems useful, so she does.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
I ain't handin' me precious crew over to ye—
and talkin' to ye's just a waste of time.
Now let's go, me minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Aye aye, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
A sailor from an outer ocean...
Aye, we've a dangerous shark in
our midst now, me hearties.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Ho! Scientist! Ye be in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Nope!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Don't be lyin' to me, ye old salt,
or I'll have ye swabbin' the deck!
Now get out here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Demanding little whippersnapper, ain'cha?
Here on behalf of the southern harbormaster,
I take it? Well, you can go pound sand!
I'm not signing any contract, nohow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Then we'll be haulin' ye outta
here by force! Get 'im, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
All right, all right! No need for that!
Kids these days, I swear... Fine, then. How does this sound?
You help me with a little experiment,
and I'll sign whatever you like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Here's the experiment: will you press
the red button, or the blue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yar, this be not me forte, says I.
Go for it, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Do ye recall the bard's song? 
'High atop the tower, void of all
its light. The color that brings
happiness is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds,
what evil should appear?
The very worst of all the beasts,
the one all pirates fear!'

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Explosion from above!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It's done! IT'S DONE! At long last, the lamp
has been destroyed! Now I don't have to be
the lighthouse keeper anymore! WAH-HOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Damn yer brainy bones!
Ye used us!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, and now I have a warning: ghosts tend to
appear in the lamp room, you see, and whenever
I turn the light on, they immediately switch
it back off again. Now, while I'm not afraid of some half-
baked apparition, they ARE rather a pain.
...Hence the explosives.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
EEEEP! GH-GH-GH-GHOOOOOOST! Oh, but I'm no good with violence.
You handle this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Those don't be ghosts—they be fiends!
Get ready, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
I've a question, love: Why dinnae
ye press the button yourself?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Because it's no fun if I do it! Don't you see? The joy lies in the endless possibilities within the choice of which button you're going to push!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
I got idea what ye be talkin' about.
But we did yer little experiment,
so get to signin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, yes. Thankfully, I read the fine print,
which says that in the event the lighthouse
is destroyed, the occupant is under no
obligation to work. Aaaaaand...signed!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
About time! ...Yar, minnow, all that hagglin'
worked me up a fearsome appetite. Let's get
back to the southern harbormaster and eat!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: I cannae eat. Go ahead, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Quake! Look sharp!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It is done! Thanks to my triangular design,
my magnum opus is now launched! Looooook!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Gar, by all the slugs in the sea!
The Iron Island be MOVIN'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
With something so monstrous lurking about,
ships will stop coming to the bay entirely.
Why, we won't even NEED a lighthouse anymore!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Say, old man... Dare ye me
to be eatin' that thing?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Is food all you ever think about?
Yes, well, there you have it.
Contract signed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Now then, I've no time to be conversing
with gluttons, so if you're finished here,
I'd kindly ask you to take a hike!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
That's a ship from a different world.
I don't think we should get close.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I'm impressed you handled that eccentric!
I just hope he didn't drag you into any of
his experiments with weird contraptions.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
He did that, aye. Couldn't make fin
nor tail of what he be askin',
but we made it out alive. I'm no good at this thinkin' stuff,
so I'm glad the minnow be with me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Well, that just leaves retrieving the stolen
goods, which I know is a lot more difficult.
Even if the reward IS pretty hefty...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, ye'd have to be a mad dog
to go up against Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Well. I can't force you to do it...
Plus there's really no point if you die.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: I'll protect ye, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Gahar har har! Ye've got quite the swollen
head for a minnow! But if ye be so confident,
who be I to say nay?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
If you plan to head to the pirate base,
I suggest you switch over to a raft.
You'll never make it past those pesky
caves otherwise.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
This is the jade urn, all right; I'm impressed
you managed to get it back from Baltasar.
The client is going to be very happy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
And now we be havin' enough treasure
for a new ship! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Oh, I actually paid the shipyard before you
even set out. I mean, I knew you needed
that ship, so why not?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
By me dirty breeches, I...
I don't be knowin' what to say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I recommend a word of thanks.
'Cheers' perhaps, among others.
Just use your favorite.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Quit peepin' in on me private monologues,
ye meddlin' minnow! Gar, but thank ye, harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Not a problem. Oh, but I'm afraid I'm not all
sunshine and lollipops today. There's a group
up north that wants to see you about the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, I figured. They paid the deposit fair
and true, and I ain't given 'em the goods.
I just hope they don't be sendin' me off
to the gallows...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Be careful, Ivar. The pirates around here
are growing more bold in their search for
the egg—they've even taken to attacking
each other as well as merchant ships.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
If they be havin' the stones to attack us,
we'll show 'em the color of their own guts!
Ain't that right, minnow!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Aye, I'll sort the fighting out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Ha! I love it! Well, if you do happen to
take them out, bring their flag back to
me and I'll give you a nice reward.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Gar, now I hope they be attackin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Hope? Sorry, I dinnae understand.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I've got something good for you: equipment
said to belong to a pirate of legend. It's old and
worn, but you might get some interesting use
out of it if you enhance it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, this be worn like an old boot...
But if it's a present from ye,
I'll be takin' it gladly!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Good luck. I tried using it in my younger
days, and things got...strange.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
It's finally time to get your own sailboat!
As always, the schematics need a little bit
of your own magic worked on them—and you
might find it a tad tricky this time around!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Yer up, minnow! Give it yer all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Fine, I'll do it! Give it here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, this mighty ship'll let us be takin' on
some real jobs now—but we best fill our
bellies before we set sail for the north.
Come, ye deck-swabbers! Meals on me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Beg pardon, but I've got a question:
what do ye know of Deus Maris's egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Oh, plenty! So long ago, all eggs were raised by
the guardians of Deus Maris. Whenever one hatched,
they would wish for Deus Maris to grow up healthy
and happy and send it on its way.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Were these guardians chosen
by Deus Maris, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Who knows? Regardless, Deus Maris
blessed this world, oceans thrived,
and there was peace. I should also mention I heard that part of
the story from Azure, so it might just be
something she said to paint her and the
other guardians in a good light.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Anyway, one day, a pirate stole the egg and made
a wish. The seas turned wild and choppy, pirates
started fighting over the egg, and the peaceful
waters were no more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
That was how things were at least as far back
as my grandpappy's time, so all that 'peaceful
ocean' stuff might be an old myth. Who knows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Not me, 'cause I'm missing my data.
So Azure's the last guardian, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Apparently. She doesn't age, so there's no
reason it couldn't be true, but I have a
hard time believing much of anything she says. I mean, she's never said what the
guardians actually DID to protect
Deus Maris, so...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Perhaps she's immortal, then?
Gosh, guardians really ARE special...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
We're all wondering who's going to find the
egg and make a wish this time. Probably doesn't
matter—I just hope the wish doesn't make
things worse for all of us who live here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Yar, that was a feast! Now we sail for the
northern harbor, lads! There's pirates about,
so keep a wary eye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, could it be?
Is Deus Maris callin' me?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
A new ship could withstand
the cyclone. Let's go!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Deus Maris's egg! It's back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Could be just a wee coincidence that it
came back to ye, but I imagine it's got
some meaning to Deus Maris as well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I knew it, ye dog! Ye came to the cyclone
because ye have the egg! Well, ye might
be the son of both Sigurd and Baltasar,
but ye'll never win against me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Oh, those pirates are after the egg!
What do we do, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I'll lay me bones in the cold ground
before I be handin' this egg over!
We be takin' it to the northern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Nae, let's give it to 'em.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Right, let's send 'em packing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, yer right. Take it, ye scoundrels!
Take it and begone from me sight!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Har har! Yer a smart one, cully—maybe
ye'll live longer than most. Farewell!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, though that egg could have been makin'
us rich, dead men spend no coin. We be doin'
the right thing there, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
You could've made money?
Gosh, I'm sorry.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
What's done be done, minnow. The egg
be goin' to Baltasar, for the northern
harbor is his stompin' ground. By givin' that pirate the egg, we be forcin'
him to fight Baltasar—which means all the
pirates are gonna be weaker! Gahar har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
A fisherman's profit!
Fine strategy, that is.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Listen close, minnow: all that be matterin'
is who hatches the egg at the end. Now keep
yer head down and make for the north!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, we best be hurryin' to the northern
harbor before the rest of those lice-
infested scum be catchin' up to us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Now yer wounded AND ye've lost the egg.
A stupid decision! Everyone be knowin'
only the smartest sailors survive on these
here seas. Farewell, chumps! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I couldn't protect the egg, Captain.
Sorry I wasn't much good to ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, it be fine, minnow; it'd only end up in
Baltasar's claws anyway if we took it north,
for the harbor be his stompin' ground. Aye, better to be lettin' the egg go
and make the pirates squabble over it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
You were to take it to the northern harbor,
then? Oh, but the captain will be steamed!
Ye'll not get your reward for that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Don't be speakin' that aloud, minnow!
Ohhh, me poor precious egg...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Let's cut to the chase, Captain!
Where's the damn egg!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, she be here, just as promised.
And your end'a the deal, cully?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Oh ho! Deus Maris's egg! It's miiine!
Thank the stars! I'd have been dead meat
if this deal fell through. Right then. Here's your money.
Now take it and get out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, now we can be payin' back
the southern harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
So what happens to the egg now, then?
Will the harbormaster's wish come true?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Nay, minnow. That egg be goin'
straight to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Baltasar will never be lettin' the egg go,
which means we always know just where it be.
All we do now is steal it back from him
at the very last second! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
That be the Pillar to Heaven, or me name
not be Captain Ivar! Yar, it be puttin' all
the other cyclones to shame.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Aye, minnow. Raise the mainsail, lads!
We be settin' out for a cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text: The egg not be with me, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
But I PAID you, you... You damn PIRATE!
Well, this is simply unacceptable.
Get out there right now and find it
before I lose my head!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, I know where it be headed: to Baltasar,
strongest pirate in all the many seas.
Ye need not worry about it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ye need not worry 'bout that neither!
I'll be handlin' that pox-faced louse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Spoken like Baltasar's son, Captain.
Also, I'm holding you to that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ivar must have a death wish.
Doesn't he know Baltasar is immortal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text: Ho, Captain! Come here to trade?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
I be the captain of a trading vessel,
ye daft barnacle! What else would I
be doin' here!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
In that case, I have something special.
It's...a parrot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
By gar, I've always been wantin' me
one'a those! Name yer price!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Bring me sugar from the southern harbor.
I hear you'll receive it as a reward if you
take out the wanted pirates there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Gar, nothin' be so sweet as sugar...
But I've a deal fair and true for ye,
harbormaster! Ye be cookin' with that
sugar, and I'll be doin' the tastin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
Is EVERYTHING about food with you?
Oh, but fine. So I'm going to be making
a cake that looks like Deus Maris's egg.
You know, the one we use in the ceremony?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
