Yar, that be him, all right—this bird
treats me as poorly as Sigurd did. Ya got a deal, harbormaster—I'll take him.
Er, but do ya mind if I pay ya later?
I be a little short at the moment.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Of course, of course!
Not a problem at all.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Aaah ha ha ha ha! Yes! Yessssss!
I'm finally free of that damn bird!
Lock up the kids and grab a bucket,
because I'm gonna get loaded!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: GIMME FOOD! GIMME FOOD! SO HUNGRY! ALSO BOOZE! NEED A PINT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text:
Cease yer chatter, ya damnable bird!
Yar, yer name be Pedro, right?
Well, Pedro, yer gonna be tellin'
me where Sigurd hid his treasure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: DON'T TELL BALTASAR! DON'T TELL HIM! SIGURD MADE ME PROMISE JUST BEFORE HE DIED! SO CRAM IT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text:
If ya don't tell me, I'll stuff ya
in a pie and feed ya to Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: YOUR TREASURE NOW! ALL YOURS! FOLLOW ME! FOLLOW ME!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yer up, Ivar! Oh, but we ain't at
the blue hole, so no need to panic.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Gar, then I be divin' in.
Treasure, ahoy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
You there! Bird! What the hell IS
Sigurd's treasure, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: DON'T KNOW! STUPID QUESTION! SIGURD DIDN'T TELL! NEVER TOLD!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yar, I suppose he always was a crafty sort
like that. Hell, not like anyone would
have believed him anyway.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Gahar har har! Found it!
Surprised it be so small, but—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: BUT IT'S MINE NOW! ALL MINE! THANKS, CHUMPS! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Oh my days, Pedro flew off with the box!
What do we do now?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
I'll tell ya the plan: we're gonna chase that
thrice-damned bird down so I can grill it
alive and feed it to Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: FOLLOWED ME! FOLLOWED ME! WHAT JERKS! GONNA BEAT THE STUFFING OUTTA YOU NOW!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: Now what do we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Stay on yer toes, lass—if ya don't give yer
all against Sigurd's parrot, he'll use yer
guts to line the floor of his cage!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: SORRY. SO SORRY. MY FAULT. HERE'S THE TREASURE.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yer a cute thing once ya behave.
Yar, then! Let's see what we got.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
What in the hells!? Ya call this a treasure,
ya squawkin' bastard!? Best be handin' it
over now before I pluck ya bare!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: PEDRO'S INNOCENT! SO INNOCENT! ALL SIGURD'S FAULT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: Happy to have it. Cheers!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Well, Pedro, yer free now. Fly away!
Go live with yer kin in the sky!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: I WAS LEAVING ANYWAY! SEE YOU IN HELL! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
I dinnae think that was a parrot.
I think that was a fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Stow it, lass! That be Sigurd's parrot—
I'd recognize him anywhere.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
Why, ya lyin' muskrat! Yer right here!
Also, I know ya be makin' a buncha weird
science things, so show 'em to me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
I'm inclined to say no, seeing as your
very existence is an affront to the
entire natural order of the universe... But since you want to see my weird
science things, I'll overlook it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
Now come see—no, come EXPERIENCE—
my very weirdest science thing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Dispatch the drone unit.
Do not allow them to approach.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Prepare the type-three shrapnel shells.
I want covering fire on the drone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Type-three shrapnel shells
loaded and ready, sir!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text: Wait for the drone to engage.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
The enemy's withdrawing, sir!
Do we pursue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
No. We're low on ammo, and don't know
how much farther we'll need to travel.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Good! Continue our voyage
to our destination.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text: Oh, look at the birds! How lovely.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text:
Yar, they be me natural enemy—come
to peck at me dead flesh, they have!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text:
So immortal doesn't mean
invincible then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text: Not to PAIN, ya daft seahorse!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Heh heh heh... What does the Dead Man's Ship
want at the shipyard, and why is a nuts-and-
bolts contraption at the rudder? It's almost like I'm seeing a ghost...
except that I AM one! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, ye steered us straight to the
shipyard, minnow! Who BE ye!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
I am D05-72314, also known
as Songstress Diva No. 5,
and I'm lookin' for my heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Come here from an outer ocean for a heart,
have ye, Viva Jive? Now I see why ye be
steerin' a ship better than me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text: Do you know where I might be able to find a heart, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
You two are talking like a captain
and a mate who've never met before!
I take it your ship sunk?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Aye—but we've come here to
find a ship of a different sort.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
The son of Baltasar the pirate and a sailor
from another sea riding the Dead Man's Ship
together? Oh, but this IS a thrilling tale!
You must tell me what happens next!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
I hope we reach the Sea of the Living,
but it's not happened yet.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Ohhh? Heh heh heh! In that case,
allow me to help you with the
next step of your adventure! When the shipyard asks for payment, you will
need two gems: Deus Maris's Sapphire,
and Deus Maris's Ruby.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
The boss of the shipyard knows of
the sapphire, but you'll need to find
the ruby yourself. Here's a spoiler, though: the sapphire
is said to be at the bottom of the
blue hole, the deepest area in all
the Mare Nostrum!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Heh heh! What will you do, adventurers?
Will you search for the sapphire in the
dangerous blue hole, or gather information
on the unknown ruby instead? Choose wisely, now—I'd HATE to see you
make the wrong decision! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, I know where the blue hole be,
but have no idea about the ruby.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
My sensors will come in proper
handy for finding lost trinkets!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, but if ye have such power,
why not abandon me to me own fate
and go find yer heart?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
I cannae do any searchin' without
a specific target. Also, what is
a 'heart,' anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, I'll not claim to understand ye, but I be
grateful for the help. Now let's find those
gems, take 'em to the shipyard boss, and tell
him the finest tale he's ever heard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
This is the blue hole? I cannae even tell
how deep it goes! Do you really plan on
divin' in there, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Are ye mad!? No one can swim that far!
And we've no proof it's fine in the
Sea Betwixt, either.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Dear me, that blue ship
has got closer.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Yar, that be Azure's ship, the Blue Demon!
What hole was she crawlin' out from!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
We could ask Azure how to retrieve the
sapphire. She might know something.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
I be not hopeful considering how she
was earlier, but we've little choice...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
It be empty. Yar, but tales of the sea
always did say Azure sailed it alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text: Is that possible, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
You have come, Ivar, Child of Pirates.
All is as Azure foretold.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Yar, this ghost be the one steerin' the ship!
But now that we're on the Sea Betwixt,
we can see its ghostly crew.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
We need to fetch the sapphire from the
blue hole. Do ye know how to do that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Azure bade me assist you in obtaining
the sapphire, but what will you see
done for me in return?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Not sugarcoatin' anything, are ye?
Well, I may be havin' pirates for parents,
but Ivar be a man honest and true.
Whatever I can do for ye, I will.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
The pirates put we guardians to the sword.
Azure is the only who remains, and she
fights all the endless days alone to
safeguard Deus Maris. So I ask this, Ivar, Child of Pirates:
save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text: Gar, if only I be knowin' how!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
That is something you will need to figure
out for yourself, Ivar, Child of Pirates.
Now go forth and find the sapphire.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Seems we have another task, then.
How are we gonna sort it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
I've no blasted idea, minnow.
How am I supposed to save Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Here is the Deus Maris's Sapphire.
Now go forth and find the ruby.
Save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text: Ruby's next. Starting the scan.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
It's the Northern Trade Port.
Be there commerce in the Sea Betwixt?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
We're looking for Deus Maris's Ruby.
Can ye maybe help us with that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
You seek information? That is a transaction,
and all transactions command a price.
What do you have to offer?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Er, would you like my life?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
A decisive choice. Most excellent!
Deus Maris's Ruby waits in the
hideout of the pirate Baltasar,
who leads the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
This is an exquisite life.
At last, I am free...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
A callow choice, yet one most excellent!
Now overcome you shall...for your answer
lies beyond this battle!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Then we make no bargain. Begone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
You have overcome the challenge.
Deus Maris's Ruby waits in the
hideout of the pirate Baltasar,
who leads the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, be waves of this size normal
in the Sea Betwixt?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
That's a mighty fiend that dwells in these
waters—one I've risked my life to pursue!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Don't sweat the details! Chase it!
It's getting away!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
I knew it! That creature had swallowed
my research logs! Now I can continue
my research on Deus Maris! Huzzah!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, he be vanishin'! But he left his
log behind when his soul passed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
'I heard about a mighty gem called
the Deus Maris's Ruby today! Alas,
it's hidden in a pirate lair, so I'll
probably never lay eyes on it...'

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
A pirate lair? Yar, I be knowin' where that
is, minnow—and this ghost ship will sail us
there straightaway!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
It got away AGAIN!? Dang, dang, daaang!
My pursuit of the beast will never end!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, he be vanishin'...and I be mighty
confused as to what that all be about!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
The space between life and death? Yar, nothin'
be different, except there be no livin' things.
Still, I never knew it would be so quiet 
without pirates about.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
This be a maze designed to trap outsiders.
But pirates are raised here, so we should
be all right.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ye know this place, Captain?
Oh, I do love that confidence!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Yar, though I was born and raised here,
I be no pirate. Anyway, this be the office for the
White Whale captain. If the ruby
be anywhere, it be here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Oh! Someone's on the other side.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Spare your pity and kill me already!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ya got the wrong idea! I just need ya to
answer one little question for me, Azure:
where's me heart hidden? I know it be somewhere in the Sea Betwixt,
and I know YOU know where—so why is it
ya never took the chance to destroy it and
kill me off for good?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Deus Maris made you immortal, Baltasar—
and as his guardian, I would never dream
of going against his wishes. So no, Baltasar. I won't kill you.
Instead, I will guard your heart
and your immortality forever!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Oh, I get ya, lass. Thing is, I just wanna keep
me heart with me at all times—helps me
rest easier at night, see? So c'mon now.
Tell me where ya hid it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Now I'm REALLY never going to tell you.
Also, you must know you can't keep me
here for long; I'll traverse the
Sea Betwixt and escape this place.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ah, but you need the Blue Demon for that,
right? And since ya don't have yer ship,
I've nothin' to be afraid of! Actually, that gives me an idea: I'm gonna
go sink yer damn ship and nip this right in
the bud! Stay there, lass! Back in two shakes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ivar! I know you're there, Ivar,
and I know you just heard everything!
The guardians' Blue Demon is in danger,
and I need you to warn them right now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Aye, lass—but we be lookin' for the ruby,
and I'll not leave this place without it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Do our voices not reach ye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
You'll find Deus Maris's Ruby in an underground
vault. It's protected by a unique trap created
by Sigurd, but I imagine his son will have
little trouble disarming it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Now be quick! If the Blue Demon sinks,
all is lost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Let's hurry on to the vault!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
That's Deus Maris's Ruby!
Glad we found it straight away.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Aye, but that just means the trap
protectin' it'll be all the worse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
And it was your da who
built this trap, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
It be me birth father, Sigurd the pirate—
but I still can't make heads or tails of it!
I almost died once here for Baltasar,
and I'll not be doin' it again.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
I don't mind suffering a wee bit
of damage, so let me give it a go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
I got the ruby. Let's hurry
on to the Blue Demon!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Ivar, child of pirates...
Save Azure. Save our guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Stow it, ye ghostly mumbler!
That be an impossible request!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Where be your compass pointin',
Viva Jive?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
One line goes to the shipyard,
the other to Dead Man's Bay.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Yar, we best be headin' to Dead Man's Bay
if we want to save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text: Dead Man's bay it is, then!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
But hear me first, Viva Jive.
Yer body be lookin' a bit...transparent. I know ye had yer own goal, and I'd not see
ye get wrapped up in this any more than ye
already are. This be a problem for the people
of the Mare Nostrum, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
The hell!? Yer not Azure! I've been waiting here for
twenty-five years, and when someone finally visits,
it's my damn son—who grew up to be an utter fool! Bah. Why is it that nothing ever
works out for ol' Sigurd?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Aye. 'Tis Sigurd the Pirate,
leader of the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Can't really fathom why yer wanderin' the
Sea Betwixt, boy, but since yer my son,
I'll be hearin' ya out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Gar, since ye were once Baltasar's true
friend, I was hopin' ye might be knowin'
the location of his heart. I figure it
be here in the Sea Betwixt, but—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
His FRIEND!? That shambling heap of carrion
stole the White Whales from me! I'd crush
his damn heart in my fist if I could!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text: But sadly, I can't. The Sea Betwixt be the only place where his heart is safe. He's going to live forever— he's going to rot forever.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Well, Baltasar's been lookin' for his heart.
In the meantime, we'll help ourselves to this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Nay, cully! That be my one possession,
and it comes with a price to match!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Then here's my price: take me out of here.
Azure may not have given me the go-ahead,
but I know YOU will...right, Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Did ye not slaughter the guardians?
Nay, I can't be takin' ye anywhere—
but I still need that heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Fine then, ya ungrateful whelp!
If ya think ya can take it,
shoot yer shot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Dirty pool, Ivar! A true man fights his
own battles—they don't leave 'em in the
hands of some sneaky little wench!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
We will be takin' this heart, then.
Terribly sorry about all this!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Damn you, ya bilge-drinking ogre!
Curse ya! Blast yer bastard bones!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
You really brought me the gems?
But no one's EVER done that before!
Well, whatever. Show them to me! Quickly!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Heh heh! Oh yes, this should be more than
enough power for me to bring your little
ghost ship back to life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
I can indeed! That said, this is the
Sea Betwixt, so think of me as less of
a builder and more of...a shaman! Also, this is my first time doing this,
so I sure hope it works! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
No choice but to let him try and pray
he be havin' some skill, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Whoops! Almost forgot. Before I start,
tell me about your adventure—and REALLY
pump up the thrills, because I think
that'll make this all go better.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Yar, then settle in for a whale of a tale!
So the adventurers were leavin' the shipyard,
guided by Viva Jive's eerie power...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
...And then the ship comes back to life!
Gar, that be the end of me tale.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
What an adventure...
But it's not finished yet!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Aye, so it's not! That's why we be needin'
a ship, for the next part of our tale
takes place in the Sea of the Livin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
So the ship I revive will show me the
rest of the adventure? How fantastic!
Oh, I feel more motivated than ever!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Hear me, gems! Fill this ship with life
and return it to the living, so it may
sail the seas once again! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Gar, this be me ship! The Sea Turtle!
The one Baltasar sank!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Ahhh, I haven't done work that good in a
long time. Thought I might actually find
peace and pass on, but... Eh, oh well. Oh, and don't forget that ships have lives.
Treat her well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Since you're back, I assume you have
both gems? If so, your ship will
assuredly come back to life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Hear me, gems! Fill this ship with life
and return it to the living, so it may
sail the seas once again! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Gar, this be me ship! The Sea Turtle!
The one Baltasar sank!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Ahh, another job well done by me.
Thought I might actually find peace
and pass on, but... Eh, oh well. Oh, and don't forget that ships have lives.
Treat her well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.text: It be time to save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer compass brought us here, minnow,
which means Deus Maris be grantin'
us a wish. But Baltasar has the egg,
and he be immortal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
So it's not possible to annihilate him
completely? Aye, we'll have to keep
thumping on him and find the right
moment to take a decisive blow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Are ye so confident we can
be winnin' this, minnow?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Nae—but I do think it's possible.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer not the only immortal one here,
Baltasar! Yar, and I'm not the one
that's got business with ye—that be
this minnow from an outer ocean.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: I need that egg to find my heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
The other oceans are filled with fools!
Do ya not know what 'immortal' means? Fine then. Come here so I can show ya—
and then take that knowledge back to
yer fool home!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
All right, all right! I get it! Yer strong!
Now just lemme go, and I'll give ya
a chance to wish on the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
This is Deus Maris's egg!
Crivens, its energy readings
are just incredible!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Ye really don't mind if I make
my own wish, Captain Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
We'll be solvin' our own problems,
minnow. Go swim on back to yer home.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Cheers, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: O Deus Maris, take me to my heart!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Seems this is goodbye, then.
Be well, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Take care, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Now everything's back to the way
it was at the beginning.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Except I've lost the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yar, then hop aboard if ye want!
I be needin' all the hands I can get.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer not the only immortal one here,
Baltasar. Also, I've got yer heart,
just as ye asked.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I'm so proud of ya, boy!
Now everything's ready for me to wish
on the egg. Aye, and I promise you'll
get somethin' out of this, too.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Nay, Baltasar, I'll be the one makin' the
wishes here. I propose a trade: yer heart
for the egg. And no monkey business,
or I'll be crushin' yer heart in me fists!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yar, I take it all back! Yer Sigurd's son
through and through: a bilge-drinkin'
scoundrel to the last!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
I treated ye like me father, just as ye
wanted. Now take yer heart and go!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
I hope you're not planning to make any
stupid pirate wishes, Ivar—because I
absolutely can't allow that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Hear me, O Deus Maris! Set Azure
free from her role as guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
And in her stead, let me
be protectin' yer eggs.
...Happy?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Ivar, you...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Well, how am I supposed to be savin' ye
otherwise? I'm not a clever man—this is
all I could be comin' up with. I'm trustin' ye to take Azure back to
your ocean, Viva Jive. May ye both
find happiness in the waters beyond!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Water...from my eyes?
What does this mean?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: They're tears, love.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Oh! I found the Blue Demon! But how are
we supposed to get their attention?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Yar, but Baltasar's ship be close!
Quick! Hide in the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
You are Ivar, son of Sigurd.
Child of the loathsome man who
slaked his thirst with our blood.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Yar, that not be matterin' now!
I got orders from Azure, so begone
from here before Baltasar attacks!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
You vexing, cursed child.
You bring naught but ill news.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Ready the attack!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Damn! They disappeared!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
I'm chuffed we made it in time,
but maybe we didn't need to
come here after all?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
A ship can't be movin' without orders
from its captain—even the Blue Demon!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Just so, Captain Ivar—I sensed Azure's
orders in your voice. Is she all right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, for now. Baltasar be levelheaded for
a pirate, so he'll not be rippin' Azure to
shreds and killin' her—but that don't mean
we can just leave her in his clutches.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Not until we sense Azure's orders.
For perhaps she wanted to be
captured by Baltasar all along.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
I think she may have a proper
clever plan up her sleeve.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: She does—one you know not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, so be it. But I've a request: we be
needin' yer help to get Deus Maris's
Sapphire from the blue hole.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Very well. Consider this repayment for
my debt, Ivar, son of Sigurd the Terrible.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: We can get our ship now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, but let's be hurryin', minnow.
We're lookin' a bit transparent here,
which means we're near dead ourselves.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Oh my days! Well, but at least
I can still hold objects.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
And I can steer, so we'll
just be makin' do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Once you return to the Sea of the Living,
Ivar, you will no longer be able to obtain
Baltasar's heart. Do you still wish to
set sail immediately?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Baltasar and Azure be talkin' about that,
but it's nothin' to do with me. Besides,
Azure swore to guard his heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
That is indeed Azure's promise,
for she is a guardian of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Gar, belay that talk! I be the captain of a
trade ship—not a pirate, and not a guardian!
So don't go tryin' to make me think takin' the
heart of the man who raised me be a fine idea.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
And you, sailor from an outer ocean?
What if Baltasar's heart proves key
to your own?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Then I cannae ignore it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: All is as Deus Maris wills it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Where be yer compass pointin', minnow?
The shipyard, or Baltasar's heart?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Both—so where should we go?
Seems Baltasar's heart is in a
place called Dead Man's Bay.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, that be a fittin' hiding spot for
a heart—but I'll leave the final
decision up to ye, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.text:
Yar, let's go help Azure.
Where be Baltasar now?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.text:
Dead Man's Bay. We should really
hurry up and save Azure, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yer not the only immortal
one here, Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Ivar, his heart...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Baltasar's heart be at the bottom of the bay.
But the only one who can be retrievin' it
is Azure and the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Is that true? How the hell
do ya know all that!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Plenty happened after ye sunk me ship,
and that was but one'a the things
I learned out there. I speak true: if ye be freein' Azure,
she can get yer heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Or she'll take the heart and sail away!
Do ya take me for a fool!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Then I'll stay here as yer hostage,
while the minnow goes with her.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Will she even listen to me though?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I don't think guardians are all
that loyal to begin with, but at least we
can have some fun until the egg hatches! Oh, and if ya don't come back, Azure, I'm gonna
give Ivar's blood to Deus Maris. Can't wait
to see what he'll wish for when that happens!
Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: I be countin' on ya, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I've no real confidence here,
but I'll give it a go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hold up now, love!
We need to get the heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I have no reason to follow your orders.
And if you don't like that, put up or shut up.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Guess it's putting-up time, then!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Now let's go get that heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Hmph. You will regret this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Azure! Glad to see ya,
lass—how long's it been? Also, don't think ya
know how happy I am that ya remembered me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
That won't work on me, you sly dog!
I've no business with you—my business
lies with Baltasar's heart alone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, but I love that icy side of ya. I know
it only means your fire can burn even hotter,
and I wanna see that heat more than anything!
So here! Take as many hearts as ya want!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha ! Oh, yer face! Can't believe
ya actually BELIEVED me just now! Aye, I've been listenin' to ya talk,
and I know me son's life is on the line.
Now ain't that interestin'...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So this man is Captain Ivar's da?
Doesn't look old enough to be so.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, let's be talkin' about the egg.
How are we gonna get it out of
Baltasar's grubby hands?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You're the last person I'd give the egg
to, Sigurd. I'd rather Baltasar have it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Ah, then my son's life be over.
What a short, pathetic life he had.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hold on, love! Ivar's your child.
Aren't parents supposed to protect
their children and all that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The adults are talkin' here, lass.
Now stow it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Careful, Sigurd. This one is a sailor from
an outer ocean, and Deus Maris himself has
permitted her to remain in the Mare Nostrum.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Apologies, lass. Now what say we work
together to make our dreams a reality?
Ya wanna save Ivar? Fine. I take the egg,
you take my son. That sound fair?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You forget a key point, Sigurd:
you must board the Blue Demon if
you want to leave the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! Sorry, sailor from an outer ocean,
but I've decided to work with dear Azure here.
She'll take the heart, and I'll take the egg.
Sound good? Good!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Who is he, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
That's Sigurd the pirate, Ivar's blood father
and captain of the White Whales. He is a
terrible man—one who slaughtered a great
many of my fellow guardians. He wished for eternal youth on
Deus Maris's egg, and must now live on
the Sea Betwixt for all of eternity.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So it's three of us together, eh? Well,
I'll be takin' the egg, Azure gets the
heart, and the strange lass takes Ivar.
That should do it, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
This is why I didn't want to come here!
Gods, I cannot stand this man. Very well, then. I'll leave
the final decision to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Sigurd's plan sounds good.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Let's just take the heart by force.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You're a quick learner, lass.
Raise sails, boys! We be off!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! Looks like I be not the only
pirate here! Well, me lass—don't think
I'll make it easy for ya!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You're tellin' me it's Deus Maris's will that
I'm trapped here!? WRONG, ya filthy dastards!
I'll get outta here one day—just you watch!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Will you give the heart to Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Captain Ivar's waiting for us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I suppose I should repay the man
as well, seeing as he risked his
life for my freedom.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
We've brought Baltasar's heart.
Now release Captain Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: No need. Your immortality ends here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Ya lyin' dog, Azure!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Nooo!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Baltasar is dead, and Sigurd remains
trapped in the Sea Betwixt. At last,
I have fulfilled my duty as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: What'll be happenin' to the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Well, seeing as you risked your life
to save me, I suppose it's only fair...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hear my wish, O Deus Maris, and release me
from my position as your last guardian!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, not bad, lass! I think ye worked
hard enough to earn that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Thank you, Ivar. I... ...I'm sorry, Deus Maris?
What was that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Best of luck, lass!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Azure!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
No. This is Deus Maris's will, and I can
only find freedom in death. And as I am a
guardian, I must obey that will to the end!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I'll see Azure's end through.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Nae, this is wrong!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Do you really want this, Azure!?
Is there no other way!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, I see. Ye were brought here by
Deus Maris to see through Azure's end.
Good on ye, Viva Jive.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I was just here to search for my heart,
Captain Ivar—and I think it's time
for me to take my leave from here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Farewell, minnow! May the winds
be always at yer back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I have gone against Deus Maris's will,
and no longer have a place here in the
Mare. As such, I would ask that you
take me to your outer ocean, stranger.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
So you'll help search for my heart?
Oh, thank ye so much, love!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Please take care of matters for me,
Ivar. Keep safe Deus Maris's eggs.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, on me life. Farewell, Azure!
And thanks to ye, Viva Jive.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Baltasar! Rotten as ever, I see!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Bwaaa ha ha! Yer alive—and just
look at ya! Fresh as a new baby's rump!
I swear ya must be cheatin' somehow,
because my skin be rottin' clean off!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
What say ya to a pirate's trade,
old friend? Yer heart for the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, there ain't a sorry fool in all
the Mare Nostrum who'd trust an
old pile'a gull droppings like you!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, I understand if ya don't trust me.
But if ya don't make the deal, I'll be
givin' this blighted organ to Azure—
and I think we both know what she'll do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Give me the egg, Baltasar, and I promise
in return not to harm your heart. I swear
this upon my name as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
The hell, Azure! Ya treated me like dirt,
but it's all confetti and puppies with
this skinless churl! Don't listen to the lass, Baltasar!
Ya know what'll happen to yer heart
once she gets her hands on that egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Enough! The egg be hatchin', and I'm ready!
Hear me, O Deus Maris! Make me the most
powerful fiend in all these seas so I can
swallow these fools whole!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Avast, ya flea-bitten shambler!
Not gonna happen!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Hraaah!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I cannae stand by and
watch this happen!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
If I knew Deus Maris had this sort
of power, I would have gone ahead
and made a wish of my own.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I'm chuffed you're okay, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, I can't believe ye brought that
monster down, minnow! Ye be a most
fearsome beast, and no mistake.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
It was thanks to Azure's support.
...Er, but where'd she go, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, she vanished along with the Blue Demon—
probably off to prepare to protect the next egg.
Just because Baltasar and Sigurd are in the
brine don't mean all the pirates be so.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I'm sorry I wasn't able
to save your two dads.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, they were a pair'a brass-plated dastards,
but I'm sure the pain of missin' 'em will be
hittin' me later.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Well, I need to be going.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: You should come with me, Cap'n!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Farewell then, love.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So ya finally came to me, eh, Ivar? It's only been
twenty-five damn years! Also, if I can give ya some
advice, don't go wishin' for eternal youth—it ain't
all it's cracked up to be.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Ye know him, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, ye know me, cully? Have we met?
Nay, this is the Sea Betwixt. There be
no living person here, which means...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I see the light dawn in yer eyes!
Aye, Ivar! I be yer father: the great
pirate Sigurd, leader of the White Whales!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The day of the egg's hatching draws ever closer,
and I knew it was but a matter'a time until
Azure's meddlin' drew ya to me. Tell it true:
ya came for Baltasar's heart, did ya not?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Azure be a sin-filled dog who tried to get
you to kill the man that raised ya! Aye,
and that ruthlessness is what draws ya in.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Smile, Ivar! This be a touchin' reunion with
yer old man, and ya got NO idea how happy
it makes me to know my life on the
Sea Betwixt is about to end.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I wished for eternal youth on the last egg
while Baltasar wished for immortality,
and this here is what we got. I was sent to this brine-damned place along
with Baltasar's heart—a place where time
don't pass. THAT'S the trick to my eternal
youth, lad, as well as Baltasar's immortality.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
But by gar, this place be dull! Oh, I hear
voices from the Sea of the Living, but I
can't do nothin' about 'em! There's nothin' to spend treasure on, no food
to satisfy my non-existent hunger—Oh, and don't
get me talkin' about the lack of comely lasses!
Aye, all I got with me are the rotting dead.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The damn Deus Maris cheated me and Baltasar both.
Hell, that guy lost his heart and became the dead!
I know, because I can smell the fool all the way
from this plane of existence.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Gar, but ye talk a blue streak—too bad
I don't give a ripe fart for yer sad story!
Now tell me where ye be hidin' the heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hidin'? Oh, I'm not hidin' anything.
It's right over there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Fair warning, though: ya can't hurt that
thing. Can't crush it, can't stab it,
can't shoot it. Can't do nothin' to
the damn thing in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So here, lad. Take it. Give it to Azure,
give it to Baltasar, do as ya will.
I don't care, 'cause I know whatever
ya do is gonna cause a riot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Okay then, we'll be—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
ON ONE CONDITION! Ya gotta bring me back to the
Sea of the Living on yer ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
And are ye gonna wish on the egg
when ye make it back?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, and ya'd do the same—but whose wish will
Deus Maris heed!? Bwaaa ha ha ha! It's gonna
be a merciless battle royale!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I imagine it be Deus Maris's will that
ye be allowed to leave this place,
so fine. Come along, if ye like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text:
Yar, we make for Baltasar's ship!
I bet the lout's heart is gonna show
us somethin' veeery interesting.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text: What should we do then, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text:
We've no choice but to follow him
and learn what Azure be thinkin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Me heart! Oh, I'm proud of ya, son...
so proud, I'm gonna make YER wish
come true, too!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
No, Ivar! Give me the heart! We cannot
permit the pirates to make any more
of their senseless wishes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: What should we do then, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I be givin' the heart to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I be givin' the heart to Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Ye can have yer damnable heart back,
Baltasar—but I be takin' the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Fine, whatever. This egg don't mean
nothin' when set against me heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now hear me well, boy: I know I caused
ya plenty of pain, but I did it outta love.
So you'll make me wish come true, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Don't listen to that pirate's rubbish, Ivar!
Give the egg to a guardian so the Mare can
return to being the happy sea it once was.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Why'd ye make me claim Baltasar's heart, Azure!?
Were ye plannin' to have me dirty me hands with
killin' him while yer own stayed clean—and all
while leadin' Deus Maris astray!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Ivar, listen to—

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Oh, ignore this lass, Ivar. I've been tricked
by guardians more times than I can count—
though I eventually went and hung 'em for it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris. Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did! Fate be on my side, Baltasar, which is
why I'm takin' the White Whales back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
This is YER fault, ya daft jellyfish!
YER the one who worded yer wish funny! Yar, don't listen to him, Ivar...
Not unless ya wanna end up like me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Stow it, all of ye! I know what I be wishin' for,
and it's to get out of this coral-blasted ocean
for good and all! I'm sick of it, by gar!
Sick to death of it all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And the one who'll be makin' that wish come true
is ye, Viva Jive. Aye, we best be gettin' outta
this hellhole together, minnow, so go on.
Make yer wish. I know it'll be comin' true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: All right, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
O Deus Maris!
Please lead me to my heart!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I know ya heard Deus Maris's
voice. Whoever kills this sailor from another
ocean gets to have their wish come true.
Well then, don't mind if I do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Me first! Me first!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Ach, this must be a trial for my heart,
and I'm not gonna lose!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! That's one Baltasar down!
What're you gonna do, Azure!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I will not permit your wish
to come true, Sigurd!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
First Baltasar and now you!?
Yer stronger than I thought!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, enough! I know when I'm bested!
Have fun in the other ocean, Ivar,
but I be leavin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Let's search for my heart, Ivar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, time to bid farewell
to these decrepit waters.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Farewell, me sea...
Farewell, me Mare Nostrum...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And just like that, all my nuisances are gone.
Guess I'll just take it easy while I wait for
the next egg. The era of Sigurd awaits!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I was never able to put an end to
this heart in the Sea Betwixt,
but I can in the Sea of the Living!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Gar, ye filthy woman!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
At last, I can fulfill my
duty as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! Thanks a ton, lass!
Got me the egg without liftin' a finger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris! Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did!
See, Baltasar? Fate be on my side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: This is... This is terrible. The worst possible pirate has gotten his hands on the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hold a moment there, Pa. Weren't
ye wantin' a battle royale? I've no
intention of lettin' ye make a wish
to Deus Maris so easy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Too bad, lad! Yer out of time!
The egg's gonna hatch in my arms!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now, Deus Maris! Make me wish come
true! Give me the best life as a pirate:
treasure, feasts, grog, and women!
I be wantin' it all! Bwaaa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
He literally wished for everything
in this world, then? Can such a wish
even be granted?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd, you truly are the best pirate
to ever sail the open seas. How is it
that I did not realize it until now?
I give my all as a guardian unto you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Azure!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Father, I beg ye to make me into the best
pirate there ever was! I'm proud as anything
to be yer son, and I hope ye can forgive me
for bein' so green in the piratin' ways.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Not you too, Captain! It seems
Deus Maris's power is the real deal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Good! Good on both of ya! Now let all that
transpired between us be water under the
bridge, for Sigurd the pirate has a heart
broad as the Mare Nostrum herself!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
...Er, yer not bowin' to me.
I thought there'd be some bowin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Here's what Deus Maris told me:
I must take back Azure and Ivar
in order to find my heart!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Is this Deus Maris's reward?
Not the heart you were hoping for,
is it? That's a right shame.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
What was I thinking, pouring
my heart out to Sigurd?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, I was never thinkin' I'd want
to be a pirate neither.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I saved the both of ye, but didn't
learn a thing about my heart.
Guess I'll be leaving, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, and where do I go then, minnow?
Ye be the only woman what can steer
this barnacle-blasted ship!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Oh, I'm sure you'll find plenty of
people out there who can steer better
than little ol' me. Ta, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, and there goes the minnow... Well, if it be Deus Maris's will that we fell
into the Sea Betwixt together, I suppose I can't
be arguin'. Perhaps she even be an envoy from
Deus Maris himself! What think ye, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
My wish didn't come true...
I have to start completely over...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, what in all the waters
were ye wishin' for, lass!?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I be so annoyed and bitter...
I'll never be forgivin' that woman!
Somebody fight me! I'll take ye all on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text: Yar, this be a pirate Azure killed.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Can't help wondering what Azure
did here, but if ye want to fight
that badly, I suppose I'm willing.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Gar, I was meant to rule the Mare Nostrum!
If only I be havin' Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
So why do they want
to rule the world?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I not be understandin' pirates,
for I be not one.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I have to give this back to...
But wait, where is...?
Where am I...?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
This is the Sea Betwixt.
And who are ye talkin' about?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I... I can't remember the name. I've been
here so long that my memory is...lost.
But I think...they're at the harbor?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Please... Take this and give it to them...
I have no time left...

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
An axe? 'Tis a bit rusted, but...
Gar, hold on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Aye, I see. If we get back to life,
let's be returnin' this to the owner.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Well, if ye know the owner,
I suppose there's no harm
in our hanging onto it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Well, well! If it isn't Ivar! I heard you sunk
to the bottom of the seas and left this world.
...Er, you're not a ghost or anything, right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Nay, ye blind barnacle! I be alive!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Beg pardon, love,
but is this yours?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: My axe! Where did you find it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I lent that axe to the man I loved—but when
he went off to hunt pirates, I never saw
him again. I'd thought this lost at sea...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Ye used to use that axe, lass?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I had my own reckless youth,
thank you very much! But here. Take this new axe as
thanks for returning my own.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Oh, but that looks good on her.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
