SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
The less we think about this, the better.
In fact, let's just forget it ever happened.
Gar, and here I was thinkin' ghosts were
as spooky as things were gonna get today...

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
The ship itself still be havin'
powerful, unresolved feelings.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text: Do ships have hearts too, then?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, I see... The ship wants us
to find out where it be!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Ye understand how it feels, Captain?
Does that mean we need to find out
where it is in the Sea of the Living?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Mmm, which means we'll have
to get back there first.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
My sensors are saying this location
lines up with that ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Gar, I see shipwrecked parts scattered all
over the place... Perhaps it merely be
wantin' to return to the sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Sounds like we just need to
put these parts back together.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, a raft also be a ship.
Well done, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Oh, and it sailed off alone!
What a strange sight.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Aye, and I wager this ship be deeply
touched as well. Fine job indeed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
What's this then? A gift of thanks from
the ship? Nae, that cannae be possible.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
What? Fine, I'll be doin' it.
Give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
She's a bit off-kilter, but it be fine,
for a raft also be a ship! Well done, me!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
I pray someone might hear my song!
Listen and remember and pass it along!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: Ye want us to remember yer song?

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Exactly. Do you think you can remember
what I sing, then pass the message on? ...I'll take that as a yes. Right, then!
Settle down and listen to what I call
the Ballad of the Lighthouse!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Way up atop the lighthouse
lived a science man!
He made a great big something
that he kept from all the land!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
So we just tell the scientist:
you must join that green wire!
Just slap that thing together
and your skill we will admire! Doobie doobie do! She bop bop BAO!
Scat doobide dat and a la la la!
Ha cha cha cha!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Hooo! Okay, I feel a lot better.
Thanks for listening, byeee!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
And there goes the ghost. Well,
I suppose we should go tell the
scientist in the lighthouse, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: Hello, sir. Got a message for ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well? Get to it already!
I'm a very busy man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Yar, it be somethin' about a wire,
but the color escapes me...

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that red wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that blue wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that green wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, bless you! I finally solved it
after so many years! And since that was my magnum opus,
you'd best enjoy it once you return
to life! Hee hee!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, and there he goes. Guess we'll see
what this magnum open thing is once we
get back to the Sea of the Living.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Tarnation! I failed miserably
and it's all YOUR fault! Eh, oh well. At this point, I'll just
enjoy myself here in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Very sorry, love. I think I recorded
the message incorrectly.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Please, someone save poor little me!
My fiancé was killed by fiends!
HEY! HEY! IT'S ME, PEDRO THE FIEND! GET OUTTA HERE, HUMANS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: I'M A FIEND! A TERRIBLE FIEND! RUN AWAY! RUN, COWARDS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Well, that's just sloppy! We can't
do our work if you act like that.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Avast, ye be the thieves! The ones trickin'
honest folk outta their belongings! Avast,
but that be worse than piratin', says I!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Quite strange to see a
fiend and human together.

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: SURE IS! BUT IT MAKES ME A GENIUS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Keep tootin' yer own horn
and I'll roast ye whole!

SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: NOPE! NOPE! JUST CLEARING MY THROAT! HERE! TAKE IT BACK! EVERYTHING I STOLE! OH, AND HERE'S SOME LOOT! NICE LOOT! FOUND IT ON THE GROUND AND EVERYTHING!

SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_DIVA_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Diva No. 5's maximum LP decreased by 1.
